CyPari is a Python wrapper for the PARI library [1], a computer
algebra system for number theory computations. It is derived from the
corresponding component [2] of Sage [3], but is independent of the
rest of Sage and can be used with any recent version of Python.

Install by typing

    python setup.py install 

in this directory.  

Written by William Stein, Marc Culler, and others, under the terms of
the GNU General Public License, version 2 or newer.  

Maintained by Marc Culler (culler@math.uic.edu) and Nathan Dunfield
(nathan@dunfield.info).  

[1]  http://pari.math.u-bordeaux.fr/ 
[2]  http://www.sagemath.org/doc/reference/libs/sage/libs/pari/gen.html
[3]  http://www.sagemath.org/
